title: Google Play Store getting an additional touch of Material You [Gallery]
content:
Google rolled out a Material You redesign for the Play Store in October, but it really only applied to the homescreen. The Play Store will soon get new Material You buttons throughout the app.

more…

The post Google Play Store getting an additional touch of Material You [Gallery] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Play Store will soon get new Material You buttons throughout the app. Google rolled out a Material You redesign for the Play Store...
